org.apache.tamaya.spi

Interface ConfigurationContextBuilder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultConfigurationContextBuilder

    public interface ConfigurationContextBuilder
    A builder for creating new or adapting instances of ConfigurationContext. Builders can be obtained in exactly two ways:
    1. By accessing a preinitialized builder from an existing ConfigurationContext, by calling ConfigurationContext.toBuilder().
    2. By accessing an empty builder instance from ConfigurationProvider.getConfigurationContextBuilder().
    After all changes are applied to a builder a new ConfigurationContext instance can be created and can be applied by calling ConfigurationProvider.setConfigurationContext(org.apache.tamaya.spi.ConfigurationContext).

    • Method Detail

      • setContext

        ConfigurationContextBuilder setContext(ConfigurationContext context)
        Init this builder instance with the given ConfigurationContext instance. This method will replace any existing data in the current builder with the data contained in the given ConfigurationContext.
        Parameters:
        context - the ConfigurationContext instance to be used, not null.
        Returns:
        this builder, for chaining, never null.

      • addPropertySources

        ConfigurationContextBuilder addPropertySources(PropertySource... propertySourcesToAdd)
        This method can be used for programmatically adding PropertySources. It is not needed for normal 'usage' by end users, but only for Extension Developers!
        Parameters:
        propertySourcesToAdd - the PropertySources to add
        Returns:
        this builder, for chaining, never null.

        Returns:

        Parameters:
        propertySourcesNames - the PropertySource names of the sources to remove
        Returns:
        this builder, for chaining, never null.

      • addPropertyConverter

        <T> ConfigurationContextBuilder addPropertyConverter(TypeLiteral<T> typeToConvert,
                                                     PropertyConverter<T> propertyConverter)
        This method can be used for programmatically adding PropertyConverters. It is not needed for normal 'usage' by end users, but only for Extension Developers!
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the type literal
        Parameters:
        typeToConvert - the type for which the converter is for
        propertyConverter - the PropertyConverters to add for this type
        Returns:
        this builder, for chaining, never null.

        Parameters:

        converters - the converters to remove
        Returns:
        this builder, for chaining, never null.

        Returns:
        this builder, for chaining, never null.

      • build

        ConfigurationContext build()
        Builds a ConfigurationContext based on the data set.
        Returns:
